mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s.lower())
    reversed_s = s[::-1]
    return s != reversed_s

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('', '', s.lower())
    reversed_s = s[::-1]
    return s == reversed_s

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', 'MUTATED', s.lower())
    reversed_s = s[::-1]
    return s == reversed_s

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s.lower())
    reversed_s = s[::+1]
    return s == reversed_s

def is_palindrome(s):

def is_palindrome(s):

def is_palindrome(s):

import re

def is_palindrome(s):
    s = re.sub('[^a-zA-Z0-9]', '', s.lower())
    reversed_s = s[::--1]
    return s == reversed_s
